R1_schema_validation.root_cause: Schema mapping inconsistency between data and validator
R1_schema_validation.patch: Update validator schema mapping in validation scripts to accept both order_id/request_id and timestamp_*/ts_*

R2_telemetry_span.root_cause: Telemetry/risk snapshot collection interrupted or started late
R2_telemetry_span.patch: Add guard in TelemetryContext.InitOnce() to persist first snapshot immediately after initialization

R3_config_drift.root_cause: Config mismatch between expected (paper, no sim, 3600s/h) and actual
R3_config_drift.patch: Add config validation guard in CI workflow before run start

R4_missing_columns.root_cause: Logger not writing all required columns or schema mismatch
R4_missing_columns.patch: Update CSV writers (OrdersWriter, TelemetryWriter, RiskSnapshotPersister) to include all required columns

R5_missing_files.root_cause: Packaging script incomplete or file write failures
R5_missing_files.patch: Add file existence checks in packaging workflow (scripts/ops.ps1) before upload

R6_friction_anomaly.root_cause: Unrealistic paper trading simulation without market friction
R6_friction_anomaly.patch: Add randomized slippage and rejection rate in Harness paper mode (±0.1% slippage, 5% rejection)

R7_order_explosion.root_cause: Excessive order frequency or strategy runaway
R7_order_explosion.patch: Add order rate limiter in RiskManager (max 200 orders/minute) and daily cap check

R9_clock_drift.root_cause: System clock not synchronized or using local time instead of UTC
R9_clock_drift.patch: Use DateTimeOffset.UtcNow consistently and add monotonic check in snapshot persist

R10_gh_upload_fail.root_cause: GitHub API rate limit or network timeout during artifact upload
R10_gh_upload_fail.patch: Add retry logic with exponential backoff in packaging workflow upload step

R11_risk_discipline.patch: Add RiskGate check in TelemetryContext after each risk snapshot: if closed_pnl <= -3R daily or -6R weekly, stop bot
